tool_description: StockPulse API is your one-stop financial hub. It delivers real-time stock prices, insightful analytics, ESG scores, market trends, and detailed financial reports. Empower your investment decisions with data you can trust.
name: StockPulse
title: StockPulse

api_list.name: Stock Options
api_list.description:
Option chain data is **the complete picture pertaining to option strikes of a particular stock or index in a single frame**. In the Option chain frame, the strike price is at the center and all data pertaining to calls and puts on the same strike are presented next to each other.

You can now specify the exiration date

for normal stocks :
you can directly search by tickername:
eg. tsla , msft , meta

for crypt:
try searching by ticker name followed by -USD.
for bitcoin try : btc-usd
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stockpulse1.p.rapidapi.com/options"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stockpulse1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://stockpulse1.p.rapidapi.com/options"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stockpulse1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
